query:
SELECT
                u.id::text AS "id!",
                uo.organization_id::text AS "organization_id!",
                u.email AS "email!"
            FROM app_users u
            JOIN user_organizations uo ON uo.user_id = u.id AND uo.is_default = true
            WHERE u.email = $1
              AND u.deleted_at IS NULL
            LIMIT 1
